topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7997a63687209bd0c0300#post_53b7997a63687209bd0c0300
Kaixa: We will show you no mercy when that time comes, We'l-

*An Inhuman roar rings out in the distance*

Orga: Orphnoch?

*A Being that looks like a Living statue lands Nearby*

Orphnoch: Kamen riders! You will not interfere with our plans any longer

*A Battalion of 6 Identical Kamen riders follow suit*

Kaixa: The Riotroopers?

*Following a wordless command, The Riotroopers Proceeds to Rush the Riders*
